ygData.subject: My Slayer you've grown a foot since I last saw you.
ygData.msgSnippet: Bullet blocks the door to prevent Slayers leaving. I was told to stay close in case anything happened. he wasn t expecting such a dramatic awakening. You

Bullet blocks the door to prevent Slayers leaving. "I was told to 
stay close in case anything happened." he wasn't expecting such a 
dramatic awakening. "You shouldn't be walking on that quite yet, at 
least until Prebon gives the order."

The large transformer looked at Slayer in a bullish manner, they were 
nearly the same height but Bullet was almost twice as wide so he 
didn't feal threatened. He opened a comm, "Hey boss, the stray dogs 
back." He looked up and down Slayers body, "Have a seat, the boss'll 
be here shortly."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Slayer::
> 
> He was flying. Under him, the vast expanse of trees flashed by. He 
> could see the startled animals dive out of the way as he flew by. 
> Swirling to avoid a high tree, the bot shot upwards, heading toward 
> space.
> 
> He had no idea where he was heading. He was simply flying. 
Something 
> pulled on the back of his mind. There was something he couldn't 
> remember, something very important.
> 
> Slayer yelled out as he felt a pain in his back. He spun around, 
> looking into the eyes of an wolf. Lunarpine.
> 
> The two wolves transformed into robot mode and hovered in the air. 
> Slayer leapt forward, trying to tackle Lunarpine.
> 
> The mutant simply laughed and stretched out an arm. Slayer growled 
as 
> his body was suspended in the air. Lunarpine brought his hands 
> together, the palms touching, and then suddenly moves them apart.
> 
> Slayer yelled as pain shot through him. He looked down at his body, 
> which was being torn apart by Lunarpine.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> With a roar, Slayer sits up on the table he had been layed on, 
ripping 
> his restrainta apart in the proccess.
> 
> He looks around. He was in a dark room, a familiar one. He had 
woken 
> up here once before.
> 
> Slayer gets off the table, readying his shoulder blasters and 
stepping 
> toward the door.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Prebon was again sitting in his command chair. He sat forward, 
back 
> > slightly bent. His right arm sat firmly on the armrest with his 
hand 
> > curled around the end. His left elbow sat on the other armrest 
with 
> > his hand held to his chin. The mighty leaders first two fingers 
> > tapped his lips as if in deep thought. (Classic captain Kirk 
pose.)
> > 
> > Blaze entered to give him a full report. "The operation was a 
> > success, Slayer will be 100% in a few days." she stepped back as 
if 
> > she were avoiding a flying object that didn't exist, "He'll 
regain 
> > consciousness shortly."
> > 
> > "Very good." Prebon replied, shifting his weight to his other 
> > hand. "I want him ready for action by tomorrow." Prebon wasn't a 
bot 
> > with much patience and wouldn't let one of his bots rest for more 
> > than a day unless th
